III.i.2.D.4.a
.
Requirement to Certify Eligibility and Continued Entitlement
VA may require beneficiaries to certify that an eligibility factor on which VA based an entitlement determination continues to exist.
Reference
:Â  For more information on periodic certification of continued eligibility, see
38 CFR 3.652
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Evidence Requested From the Claimant
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
